name: volt-tackle
caption: Volt Tackle

effect.short: User takes 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.  Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.
effect.full: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic:regular-damage}.  User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.  Has a 10% chance to [paralyze]{mechanic:paralyze} the target.

flavorText:
The user electrifies itself and charges the target.
This also damages the user quite a lot. This attack
may leave the target with paralysis.
